column3:
â€œI'm just going to tell a little story about this stain in its natural habitat. 

This past January I was doing some work on a tiny island off the coast of Malaysia, quite close to the Thai border. I didn't think I'd be smoking at all since I didn't have any connections and drugs carry such a stiff penalty (life in jail or execution!) but luckily for me, the native islander I was working for was quite the affianado. h...â€

â€œğŸ’œ..Whoa, This Intence old-school Thai has me Relaxing & chillin' while I honor All our Veterans Today!..Feelin' the Chronic Pain dissipating & my f'n PTSD melting, there's No ANXIETY here!..Happy, Calm, Mellow, Clear Headed THAI lifts me Up Fast..soo Elevating & Fun..Lasts a Long Time!"  I ğŸ’œ this Kind SATIVA Stone and will def buy again
column4: Thanks to Marjoe of YHS!...Many Canna Blessings! Be Well

column3: â€œPicked up a little Wild" Thai from Novel Tree this afternoon.  Smokes clean and provides a little pick me up for the afternoon.  Nice flavors and definitely a nice feeling when done.

column1: Happy New Year Washington!  Retail marijuana is finally starting to shape up and show the potential we voted for.  Enjoy your shops!â€"

column3: â€œRed String Thai, a good strain if you wanna get mellow and not stoned, mostly head high but relaxes your spine, this is my medicine for torticollis (neck & spine spasms) and it works great. It is really cheap compared to skunk and strong marijuana, i got 7g for Â£25; almost a 3rd of the price of skunk.  The best smelling cannabis ever! Smells herby and not to pungent. Its good old fashioned 1980's weed. Highly reccome...â€

â€œThis is a very nice strain. At 1st when i started smoking it the effects weren't instant. But after 30 min it all started to come together. 
pros:
nice body high 
nice head
equally even
burst of energy 
i smoked it at around 7:30 at night and woke up 5am still high. its a strain that creeps up on you but it last awhile.

cons 
dry mouth
little paranoid but it was minimal. 

i would definitely have this in my stash bo...â€

â€œSmoked this one as a wake and bake, just shared a small bowl. And although it's only been about 20 minutes, I feel like I keep getting higher and higher. We are both regular smokers, and it takes a lot to impress me to the point that I want leave a review. Looking forward to getting some chores done this morning!!â€
â€œYou should have had this when it came tied to a stick! It was some of the best back in the late 70'sâ€

â€œSmoked half a gram of this strain and ended up cleaning the shit out of my entire room and kitchen. A great energizing sativa that will still leave you good and stoned. 
It got me feeling a little too internal, which didn't feel super great with  how much energy I had. Not going to be my new morning strain, but if I need something for a sunny day in the park, I might pick some up again/â€
â€œAwesome old genetics ! Makes you feel amazing during the dayâ€
â€œWhat I smoked was Wild Thai".  Saw one other review for the strain
column5: so am including mine here.  It soared up into my brain pretty quickly. It's a strong head high that would have been great at a party
column6: but I was just trying it out while glued to my laptop one night. If put to music
column7: this super-charged high would be: Chop Suey by System of a Downâ€"

column3: â€œThis is the first time my girlfriend and I have tried this strain. It has a very sweet and soothing taste but smokes potently. It left us feeling warm, tingly, inspiref, motivated; as well as giving us that hesd high that you feel when youre smoking an indica. I smoked Thai out of a blunt and my girfriend had her share in her vapor. I did try her vapor and it hit exactly the same. I wrote the review immediately after...â€
â€œI got my Cannabis wings on Tha.  Totally nice.  Powerful and you may have more sex with it.  Just say yes when you find it.  Best bsâ€

â€œI'm not big on Sativas but I have to make an exception on this one. Great for wake and bake because it's like having a cup of coffee. Very energetic afterwards and focused. If you're into indicas like myself and you have to do a sativa. Go with this one. #420sweepstakesâ€
â€œAwesome! Great Head Highâ€

â€œthis strain is in Kandy kush and it helps to get you motivated to get things done around the house or if you wanna relax playing video games solo or with friends,  listen to music and watching TV/Movie(s)with your lover or playing video games with him/her.  also without the  paranoid feeling and no dizziness so far,  it's also good for wake and bake in the morning,  can help to increase your appetite  for the evening...â€

â€œThai stick was fantastic but now its very hard to find. I London we get alot of Thai brick weed, which has some seeds and sticks in it. The appearance is awful and the smell is not very strong. Although generally it is under rated, as it gives you one of the clearest and most euphoric sativa head high. Do not smoke the strain in the evening as it will keep you up all nightâ€

â€œThai is nice--good for relaxing while maintaining one's faculties. A few joints in and you're ready for an enjoyable walk around the city or in the park or around your neighborhood. Not the best high I've had, but certainly not a bad one, Thai is good for the quick relaxant in the afternoon or evening.â€

â€œThai is a fantastic cerebral strain. Very uplifting and relaxing. I felt very creative and made some interesting drawings that each corresponded with a number and colour. They seemed really important whilst I was high but didn't make any sense at all when I returned to the ground. Had some minor paranoia whilst a car was driving slowly in the middle of the night driving past me a number of times. Other than that it w...â€

â€œFocused. Clear. You can do whatever you do and actually get into it with this sativa. Intensity level of THC: also four stars, and it stays with you and if anything increases for a while. Fruity aroma and a pleasant taste, though milder than I expected. A nice nostalgic strain that really stood out (with a few others) decades ago, and now is one of thrillions of fine ganjas. Thrillions.â€

â€œmy friend came bye with a few Thai sticks. the bud was Thai, dipped in a honey oil.
wow pow chizow, baked. to me it tastes like strawberry milk, which is nasty, but this was cool. if you ever have the chance to chez out some thai, dont pass. check it outâ€

â€œThai Stick can you say Oats topped off with Strawberry's & Cream smell & taste little racier mixed w/ Mr Nightcourt" Welton High CBD strain was sitting real focused and heart beating very nice picked  in Sun City AZ.

column1: Waking & baking w/ coffee with rain very enjoyable pain very anxiety free.â€"

column3: â€œMy new favorite sativa. Went to the club today to pick some up after hearing nothing but good things about it. And damn it gets you high haha. 5 starsâ€

â€œFor the reasons why I smoke, this strain is amazing. Relaxation, stress and anxiety relief, helping my insomnia. Only negative is I shoveled an obscene amount of food..munchies to the extreme. 

Also after a silly, goofy outrageous conversation I got super motivated and energized.â€

â€œThis strain gave me a great high.. It gave me a giggly, uplifted, and relaxed high.
One of my top 5 favorite strains.â€
â€œWould not recommend this to anyone with anxiety/depression. It gave me one of the worst trips of my life and I only had two hits.â€
â€œGreatâ€

â€œThis strain ranks in with some of the best for me.Ever since back in high school when we smoked a chunk off of a Thai Stick"  I  was pretty much sold.I alway's loved the intense calm relaxing high it produced.I find its not a strain for when you have a lot to accomplish but for when you have some time to kick back and relax.â€"

â€œa classic is a classic for a reason. the batch that I received was a whopping 25.80 total with 25.08 being thc. helped my morning pain and got me ready for the day, great for daytime use. If they still have it when I get paid again I will definitely have this one in mind.â€

â€œThai can come in a variety of forms and phenos. The don't all have that intense cerebral sativa high they are known for. This Thai we had was a more meditational, mild and relaxed version. Definitely not indica in any way but also definitely no raciness. This is the sort of weed we need more of on the market these days as it's so easy to smoke more regularly- even on a weeknight. Nice experience !â€

â€œThat good sativa is awesome as well because you find easily happy with her. The good taste is very nice and you do like this earthy woody taste is always welcome and provider of good vibes for a long time. Honestly it's perfect to meditate or focus on something of your mind at anytime you want. I love this very good wrapping strain.â€

â€œTwo stars - I love it because it is cannabis. But haven't been impressed with any particular effects or taste of it. 
I would smoke it, but there are better alternatives.â€
â€œSmelled like a damp citrus forest.  Easy on the lungs.  Uplifting energetic high that helped me get through my chores.â€
â€œWell-above-average daytime medicine.   Lots of variations of this strain around the Seattle area.  Concentrate is solid.â€

â€œ25 years ago thai was quite the novelty as we could usually only get old skool rocky, soap or red leb. thai had a very unique look. dry smell and burning smell, taste and most interestingly of all high.
yep it was a real treat !
fast forward 25 years and it's taken pretty much all of that time to find something that's as good. After getting brick weed sold as thai on multiple occasions I recently got given some decen...â€

â€œit's quite nice! makes you think about a lot of things in a productive way. But in the same way you feel relaxed, maybe a bit too relaxed for my taste.â€

Farm: Greenbluff Greenhouse 
Total Cannaboids: 15.37%
As soon as I opened the jar an overwhelming smell of lemon came ooozing out. The taste was delicious leaving you wanting more. The high hit immediately. Great for day time usage and may make you talkative! Highly recommendedâ€

â€œloved it, made me super happy.â€

â€œVery bright green colors w a sweet diesel smell. And she has a very fast onset of smooth and relaxation. But not a couch lock   Good strain for daytime or nighttime smokeâ€

â€œThai Star- Love this strain!! 
With its earthy smell and distinctive taste, its one you will smoke and if you smoke it again, you'll remember that taste once again. A nice uplifting high, all 8 cylinders are firing, creativity boost.â€

â€œI smoked Cherry Thai" out of a glass pipe. There were a couple stems in the two little buds I loaded and personally I take those out before I smoke because I don't care to get a headache.  The high lasted a long time
column4: a few hours. I had MAJOR munchies but my knee and back didn't hurt anymore. Incredible for pain relief despite the lower THC
column5: around 19%. I got EXTREMELY paranoid as well
column6: someone came home and got out...â€"

column3:
â€œThis is a great light-handed day strain. Thai will not leave you dopey or couch locked. It makes me happy, energetic and creative. Good strain for a wake-and-bake, crowded events, sports, and anywhere where crowds may create anxiety or social anxiety.

No loss of focus and an enjoyable ride.â€
â€œAWESOME IF YOU ARE TRYING TO LOSE WIGHT AND GO TO THE GYM I HAD NO MUNCHES FROM THIS WOULD BE 5 star but most people like the munches lol it gears u fucked up toooo get this one take my adviceâ€

â€œI can't say as positive things about Thai as others have. If you simply want something that works" then sure it works. But the effects are not the best. It doesn't give a very clear high. It has very weak pain relief effects
column4: yet it causes very uncomfortable tingling in hands and a very unimpressive cerebral feeling that I've felt better from other strains. It does cause appetite rather quickly. Just not very good o...â€"

column3: â€œThe Thai, that I tried produced a decent anti-depressant head high; however groggy the next day.  It does have that typical earthy sativa flavor.  It just doesn't excel in medicinal quality (no bad side effects). There are better sativas than this one: Malawi Gold, Chocolate Thai, Panama Red, Colombian Gold, Acapulco Gold,  or even an Eldorado.  (vap'd at 335-345 degrees F).â€
â€œWith a low tolerance I've found thai weed to give me closed eye hallucinations on multiple occasions. Must have interesting genetics.â€
â€œawesome strain got me hella high.â€

â€œWas pretty good for a landrace. I was pretty happy with Thai. Helped me Focus in on what I needed to get done around the house. In my opinion, Ghost Train Haze did do a better job then Thai did when getting things done. Thai left me with a little head pressure. I will try next time in low dose (1/4) instead of a (3/4) bowl. Did leaving me somewhat Paranoid. Coughed a few times off a few rips.â€
â€œGot me lit like no other sativa so 5 starsâ€
â€œNothing special, happy light high. Weed for beginners and ladies. But at least it is always weed.â€
